title: SHOW 106 - Nicola Sturgeon (LIVE)
itunes:title: SHOW 106 - Nicola Sturgeon (LIVE)
itunes:subtitle: Nicola Sturgeon joins Matt at the Edinburgh Festiâ€¦
description:
Nicola Sturgeon joins Matt at the Edinburgh Festival for a wide-ranging and often hilarious interview. The First Minister reveals what really happened behind closed doors with Boris Johnson and her plan for dealing with him. They discuss the economic case for independence, the challenges and lessons of leadership and a love of books which leads to a question Nicola did not see coming... You can follow Nicola here: @NicolaSturgeon You can follow Matt here: @mattforde For tickets to the Political Party and other live dates go to: www.mattforde.com/live

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
